room_title: Escape room "Outbreak!" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: Fun time! We did the Outbreak Room with our kids 7, 11, 13, 15. It was a little difficult for us, but we had a great time! We will be back someday! The staff was nice and the room was really cool!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak!" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: We just celebrated our son's 11th birthday with a group of his friends in the "Outbreak" room! They had fun, and it was very tricky. We got some helpful clues but did not make it out in time! The building is nicely decorated and very cool on a hot summer day! Staff was great too. We would go back and recommend to others.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak!" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: A great night out! Well done. Can't wait to try another one.
